about_the_game:
"Starfinder RPG - Starfinder Flip-Mat - Space Station Promenade 

After days or weeks being cooped up in a starship on a long journey, heroes deserve some time to stretch their legs (or other ambulating appendages) and interact with their fellow citizens of the galaxy. And there's often no better place to do so than a wide-open thoroughfare on the nearest space station! This Starfinder Flip-Mat features a luxurious stretch of walk through an ultra-modern space station and a bustling, crowded marketplace area.. Starfinder Flip-Mats present ready-to-use science-fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. With Starfinder Flip-Mat: Space Station Promenade, you'll be ready for when your players visit their next port of call!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Starfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Pathfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:

  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
